entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
